attributes.action: ESCORT Eddie Darke out of Longbenton and sling him in the cat and dog shelter
attributes.additional_details:
OHAI GUISE!!!! WE MISSED YOU ALL A LOT!!! <333333 HERE WE ARE AGAIN!!!
DO YOU REMEMBER OUR USUAL OFFER? ASK FOR A BITCH, GET >9000 FOR FREE!!!

We stand loyal with our brothers over in the Eastside 'Benton' estate

We are the Longbenton Aggro Boys Greeting's

We have written our very honest statement here, It's intended for those
who are interested on reading it, for those fellows who don't give a fuck
about chickens and who are just lurking for the candy, skip it and jump
directly to the candy. We hope you
find it useful as well as funny. and for those who don't care about the whole
fucking shit... wtf r u doing here??


To all other struggling on their daily fight.
Remember that fights between us it's what our adversaries are looking for.
Now this is your time.
